title: “The Missing Piece”
description:
Consulting producer and writer Liz Phang joins Jason and David to talk about episode 8, “The Missing Piece.” David reveals this is his favorite episode of the season while they discuss Brother Day’s complicated relationship with Demerzel, what radicalized the Anacreons, and Gaal’s mounting frustration with Hari’s betrayal. 

This is an Apple TV+ podcast, produced by Pineapple Street Studios.

https://apple.co/-Foundation-
